text: Arnica porsildiorum is an Arctic species of arnica in the sunflower family. It is native to Russia, Alaska, Northwest Territories and Yukon Territory.Boivin, Joseph Robert Bernard 1948. Le Naturaliste Canadien 75: 210Tropicos, Arnica porsildiorum B. Boivin ==References== porsildiorum Category:Flora of Russia Category:Flora of Subarctic America Category:Plants described in 1948
title: Arnica porsildiorum
